means: 发出尖锐声，用风笛演奏

sentence.Network_en: The skirl of a police whistle split the stillness ( Sax Rohmer )
sentence.Network_cn: 警笛的尖叫声穿破了寂静 ( 萨克斯罗默 )

army bagpipers are to be forced to wear earplugs-because health and safety officers fear the skirl damages hearing .英国陆军苏格兰团的风笛手最近被强迫佩戴耳塞上岗，因为军队负责士兵健康和安全的官员担心，风笛演奏时发出的尖锐声会损坏士兵的听力。

list.exp: 和那从扬声器里传来的风笛的声音

derivation.yuyuan_name: late Middle English (as a verb): probably of Scandinavian origin; ultimately imitative

means.word_mean: 1. the sound of (the chanter of) a bagpipe
